name: Nightmare Land
description:
Come one, come all to Frightmare Land! The mysterious theme park of your nightmares! Help a little girl explore the park looking for trapped children's souls. Be careful though! If you fail, she'll be trapped for all eternity too!

Controls: 

Press X to open the menu, use the arrow keys to move around, press "Z" to interact with things.                                                                               

Criteria and Implementation:

Atmospheric:

In order for Sophia to escape Frightmare Land, she has to explore the theme park searching for trapped children’s souls.

Carnival:

Come one! Come all! Frightmare Land is the excitingly spooky theme park of your nightmares!

Wasi:

If Sophia is touched by the monsters in Frightmare Land, she gets slapped in the forehead so hard she dies a horrible death!

Eerie Music:

Sophia is surrounded by eerie sights so it would make sense to have matching eerie background music of course!

Credits:
